ğŸ›¡ï¸ Hardening Techniques

  • Encryption: Safeguards sensitive data.
  • Installation of Endpoint Protection: Antivirus/anti-malware to detect local threats.
  • Host-based Firewall: Controls device-specific network traffic.
  • Host-based Intrusion Prevention System (HIPS): Blocks threats in real time.
  • Disabling Ports/Protocols: Shuts down unneeded features to reduce risk.
  • Default Password Changes: Avoids easy-to-guess logins.
  • Removal of Unnecessary Software: Shrinks attack surface by removing unused programs.
